page.title: 15HOUSING
page.content: THEY WERE DESIGNED BY THE ARCHITECTS WHO WORKED IN CUMBERNAULD HOUSE AT THAT TIME. WE FOUND OUT THAT IT WAS CHEAPER IN THOSE DAYS TO BUILD HOUSES WITH FLAT ROOFS. SOME OF THE ROWS OF HOUSES WERE STAGGERED THEY HAD TO BE BUILT THIS WAY BECAUSE OF THE HILLY GROUND UNDERNEATH AND BECAUSE IT MADE THEM LOOK MORE INTERESTING. WE WERE SHOWN A MODEL OF HOW THE HIGH FLATS IN MILLCROFT WILL LOOK WHEN THEY ARE RENOVATED IN A FEW YEARS TIME. THEY ARE BEING RENOVATED BECAUSE THE HEATING SYSTEM IN THE FLATS IS NOT GOOD AND WATER LEAKS THROUGH THE ROOF. BEFORE THE RENOVATION WORK WAS PLANNED THE RESIDENTS WERE SURVEYED TO ASK WHAT CHANGES COULD BE MADE TO IMPROVE THE AREA WHERE THEY LIVE.
